snippet: If, per F. Scott Fitzgerald, “in a real dark night of the soul it is always three o’clock in the morning,” for many conservatives it is always 1938.
lead_paragraph: If, per F. Scott Fitzgerald, “in a real dark night of the soul it is always three o’clock in the morning,” for many conservatives it is always 1938.
